title: FS: Complete set 1878 H804-6 Forbes TradeCards. SCANS/PRICES FOR ~100 CARDS ADDED!!
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Complete set 1878 H804-6 Forbes TradeCards. SCANS/PRICES FOR ~100 CARDS ADDED!!
posts.post_content:
We have a couple sets of H804-6’s. Below is a complete set of the Forbes group without the titles on them. As you can tell, there are a couple of advertisers amongst them and the Home Run card is completely blank.

We have an additional set of these that is titled, as well as an almost set we would consider breaking up.  

Asking $350 for this exact set, but will consider offers.  I’m available via PM.

I will be posting several other trade cards from different sets and singles (titled and untitled). Here is the link to all the scans and price list.

[url]https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/16E-zLNz7AgaCfEf67S8a6tgJ89OuEcjt[/url]

Thanks for looking!

Jeff
